long_description: The Nite Ize Action iPhone Armband is a sleek, durable and flexible way to protect your phone and stay connected hands-free while you're hiking, running, or hitting the gym. Medium size fits iPhone(R) 4/4s and iPod(R) touch 4th generation and similar; Large size fits iPhone 5, iPod Touch 5th generation and similar, and Android. Just slide your device into the main pocket, thread the weather-resistant microfiber strap through the lightweight metal loop, press it closed around your upper arm, and go. Because the main pocket is faced with clear, touch-responsive thermoplastic urethane, your phone stays visible and functional as well as protected. Other design features include strategic openings at both top and bottom for headphone access and a rear slot to fit a driver's license, credit card or cash. Micro rip-and-stick fabric at both pocket flap and arm strap for secure, streamlined closure; second slit pocket with attached S-Biner and Curvyman Cord Supervisor included. Ventilated and non-absorbent microfiber repels moisture; it's lined with reflective detail and backed with 2 narrow gripper strips to prevent slipping. Flexible, seamless design for comfort during any activity; sonic welding ensures a flat, smooth fit with no seams or stitch lines to chafe or irritate your arm. Easily adjusts to fit arms from 10.5 - 16 in. in circumference. The Nite Ize Action iPhone Armband features reflective trim for passive reflectivity.
